title.narrative: WH5- Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) SECTOR GOVERNANCE

description.narrative: By 2021, state structures are in a position to effectively coordinate, monitor, assess and manage the sector's knowledge in emergency response and development areas., which contributes to Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Reducing Child Poverty, Safe And Equitable Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Services And Practices, Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Systems And Empowerment Of Communities. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: People living in disadvantaged areas, especially women and children and people affected by emergencies, use safe, affordable sanitation facilities and adopt good hygiene practices.

sector.narrative: Overall WASH – systems strengthening (e.g. sector-wide coordination, enabling environment and financing advocacy)
Water sector policy and administrative management

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, state structures are in a position to effectively coordinate, monitor, assess and manage the sector's knowledge inemergency response and development areas.

description.narrative: L&39;UNICEF contribue à créer un environnement plus favorable pour les services d&39;eau, d&39;assainissement et d&39;hygiène en soutenant un dialogue multipartite amélioré, une volonté politique renforcée et un engagement des décideurs conformément aux objectifs de développement durable tout en promouvant le lien entre interventions humanitaires et de développement. La nouvelle politique nationale de l&39;eau et de l&39;assainissement a été promulguée en 2021 et constitue le point de départ pour le développement de quatre programmes nationaux pour le secteur qui visent à soutenir l&39;intégration des ODD 2030 dans les politiques nationales et cadres stratégiques. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:25/01/2022
